description.effect.minecraft.instant_hea: Heals living entities and damages undead.
description.effect.minecraft.instant_dam: Damages living entities and heals undead.
description.effect.minecraft.jump_boost: Increases jump height and decreases fall damage.
description.effect.minecraft.fire_resist: Grants immunity to fire and lava.
description.effect.minecraft.water_breat: Grants the ability to breathe underwater.
description.effect.minecraft.blindness: Decreases viewing range and prevents the player from sprinting and dealing critical hits.
description.effect.minecraft.poison: Deals damage over time, but doesn't kill.
description.effect.minecraft.glowing: Outlines entities, making them visible through blocks.
description.effect.minecraft.luck: Increases the quality and quantity of loot.
description.effect.minecraft.unluck: Decreases the quality and quantity of loot.
description.effect.minecraft.slow_fallin: Decreases falling speed and negates fall damage.
description.effect.minecraft.conduit_pow: Prevents drowning and increases visibility and mining speed underwater.
description.effect.minecraft.bad_omen: Causes a raid to start upon entering a village.
description.effect.minecraft.hero_of_the: Gives discounts when trading and causes villagers to give gifts to the player.
description.effect.autumnity.extension: Extends the duration of active potion effects.
description.effect.autumnity.foul_taste: Next consumed food will replenish 50% more hunger points than normally.
description.effect.atmospheric.relief: Heals the user if incoming damage is greater than or equal to the level.
description.effect.atmospheric.worsening: Increases incoming damage if it is greater than or equal to the level.
description.effect.atmospheric.spitting: Makes the user spit out seeds that deal damage.
description.effect.atmospheric.persisten: Increases movement speed based on missing hunger.
description.effect.atmospheric.gelled: Decreases burning damage and increases regeneration. Extinguishes fire on initial application.
description.effect.buzzier_bees.sunny: Causes entities to behave like it's day regardless of the actual time.
description.effect.environmental.panic: Increases movement speed based on missing health.
description.effect.environmental.serenit: Prevents hostile mobs from spawning around the player.
description.effect.neapolitan.sugar_rush: Gives swiftness for the first half and slowness for the second half.
description.effect.neapolitan.vanilla_sc: Grants immunity to all potion effects.
description.effect.neapolitan.agility: Allows entities to climb up blocks.
description.effect.neapolitan.berserking: Increases damage and defence. Gains a level with every mob killed.
description.effect.upgrade_aquatic.insom: Increases the insomnia timer, causing phantoms to spawn.
description.effect.upgrade_aquatic.restf: Resets the insomnia timer like if the player just slept.
description.effect.abundance.succumbing: Poisons the user for a short time upon taking damage.
description.effect.abundance.supportive: Gives regeneration to animals, strength to neutral mobs and resistance to monsters around the user.
description.alexsmobs.potion.bug_pheromo: Makes the user invisible to hostile arthropods.
description.alexsmobs.potion.sunbird_ble: Increases speed when flying with an elytra.
description.alexsmobs.potion.sunbird_cur: Causes the player to fall quickly.
description.alexsmobs.potion.oiled: Causes the user to levitate when exposed to rain.
description.alexsmobs.potion.clinging: Allows entities to stand and walk on ceilings.
description.alexsmobs.potion.ender_flu: Kills the affected entity and spawns enderiophages upon expiring. Can be cured with milk or chorus fruit.
description.alexsmobs.potion.debilitatin: Paralyzes arthropods and deals damage to non-arthropods until half health.
description.effect.botania.soul_cross: Restores health upon slaying any other creature.
description.effect.botania.emptiness: Prevents mob spawning in a 128 block radius.
description.effect.botania.bloodthirst: Allows mobs to spawn regardless of normal conditions within 64 blocks.
description.effect.botania.allure: Doubles the speed of catching fish and fishing loot.
description.effect.botania.clear: Clears all potion effects, both positive and negative.
description.effect.farmersdelight.comfor: Grants immunity to Slowness, Hunger and Weakness.
description.effect.farmersdelight.nouris: Prevents the player from losing hunger or saturation.
description.effect.infernalexp.infection: Deals damage over time and spreads to other entities.
description.effect.potionsmaster.coalpot: Highlights coal ore around the drinker.
description.effect.potionsmaster.ironpot: Highlights iron ore around the drinker.
description.effect.potionsmaster.redston: Highlights redstone ore around the drinker.
description.effect.potionsmaster.lapispo: Highlights lapis lazuli ore around the drinker.
description.effect.potionsmaster.goldpot: Highlights gold ore around the drinker.
description.effect.potionsmaster.diamond: Highlights diamond ore around the drinker.
description.effect.potionsmaster.emerald: Highlights emerald ore around the drinker.
description.effect.potionsmaster.copperp: Highlights copper ore around the drinker.
description.effect.potionsmaster.tinpoti: Highlights tin ore around the drinker.
description.effect.potionsmaster.nickelp: Highlights nickel ore around the drinker.
description.effect.potionsmaster.alumini: Highlights aluminium ore around the drinker.
description.effect.potionsmaster.vibrani: Highlights vibranium ore around the drinker.
description.effect.potionsmaster.unobtai: Highlights unobtanium ore around the drinker.
description.effect.potionsmaster.allthem: Highlights allthemodium ore around the drinker.
description.effect.potionsmaster.uranium: Highlights uranium ore around the drinker.
description.effect.potionsmaster.leadpot: Highlights lead ore around the drinker.
description.effect.potionsmaster.silverp: Highlights silver ore around the drinker.
description.effect.potionsmaster.osmiump: Highlights osmium ore around the drinker.
description.effect.potionsmaster.zincpot: Highlights zinc ore around the drinker.
description.effect.potionsmaster.quartzp: Highlights quartz ore around the drinker.
description.effect.potionsmaster.bismuth: Highlights bismuth ore around the drinker.
description.effect.potionsmaster.crimson: Highlights crimson iron ore around the drinker.
description.effect.potionsmaster.platinu: Highlights platinum ore around the drinker.
description.effect.potionsmaster.village: Teleports the drinker to the nearest village.
description.effect.potionsmaster.shipwre: Teleports the drinker to the nearest shipwreck.
description.effect.potionsmaster.ocean_r: Teleports the drinker to the nearest ocean ruins.
description.effect.potionsmaster.buried_: Teleports the drinker to the nearest buried treasure.
description.effect.potionsmaster.endcity: Teleports the drinker to the nearest end city.
description.effect.potionsmaster.fortres: Teleports the drinker to the nearest nether fortress.
description.effect.potionsmaster.monumen: Teleports the drinker to the nearest ocean monument.
description.effect.potionsmaster.strongh: Teleports the drinker to the nearest stronghold.
description.effect.potionsmaster.swamp_h: Teleports the drinker to the nearest witch hut.
description.effect.potionsmaster.jungle_: Teleports the drinker to the nearest jungle temple.
description.effect.potionsmaster.desert_: Teleports the drinker to the nearest desert pyramid.
description.effect.potionsmaster.igloopo: Teleports the drinker to the nearest igloo.
description.effect.potionsmaster.mansion: Teleports the drinker to the nearest woodland mansion.
description.effect.potionsmaster.minesha: Teleports the drinker to the nearest mineshaft.
description.effect.potionsmaster.pillage: Teleports the drinker to the nearest pillager outpost.
description.effect.quark.danger_sight: Highlights spots where hostile mobs can spawn.
description.effect.reliquary.cure: Cures zombie villagers. Higher levers work faster.
